name: The Fool
description: The Fool represents new beginnings, adventures, and taking risks.

upright.general: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit.
upright.career: Taking risks in career or projects.

reversed.general: Recklessness, being taken advantage of, inconsideration.
reversed.love: Reluctance in relationships.
reversed.career: Fear of career changes.
reversed.finance: Avoid impulsive financial actions.

name: The Magician
description: The Magician symbolizes manifestation, creativity, and personal power.

upright.career: Turning ideas into action in your career.
upright.finance: Using resources and creativity for financial gain.

reversed.love: Illusions or deception in relationships.
reversed.career: Unrealized career goals.
reversed.finance: Mismanagement or loss of resources.

name: The High Priestess
description: The High Priestess embodies intuition, mystery, and inner wisdom.

upright.career: Using intuition and trust in decision making.

reversed.general: Secrets, disconnection from intuition, repressed emotions.
reversed.love: Lack of emotional openness or dishonesty.
reversed.career: Not trusting your gut in career decisions.
reversed.finance: Overlooking financial dangers or secrets.

name: The Empress
description: The Empress symbolizes fertility, nurturing, and abundance.

reversed.love: Neglect in relationships or emotional burnout.
reversed.career: Stagnation or creative block in work.
reversed.finance: Financial difficulties due to lack of planning.

reversed.finance: Risky financial moves or breaking away from traditional investments.

upright.finance: Careful planning and effort in financial matters.

reversed.love: Neglecting relationships or lack of effort.
reversed.career: Burnout or dissatisfaction with work progress.
reversed.finance: Unfocused financial planning or perfectionism leading to delays.

name: Nine of Pentacles
description: The Nine of Pentacles represents self-sufficiency, financial independence, and luxury.

upright.career: Achieving success and independence in career.

reversed.love: Loneliness or emotional isolation in relationships.
reversed.career: Unfulfillment despite financial success at work.
reversed.finance: Instability due to overindulgence or mismanagement of resources.

name: Ten of Pentacles
description: The Ten of Pentacles represents financial stability, legacy, and long-term success.

upright.general: Financial stability, legacy, long-term success, family prosperity.
upright.love: Building a long-term and secure relationship.
upright.career: Achieving lasting success in career.
upright.finance: Financial security and creating a legacy.

reversed.love: Financial disagreements or family issues affecting relationships.
reversed.career: Instability in long-term career goals.
reversed.finance: Financial difficulties or loss of legacy.

name: Page of Pentacles
description: The Page of Pentacles represents ambition, desire for growth, and new beginnings in finance or career.

upright.general: Ambition, desire for growth, new financial or career opportunities.
upright.love: Exciting new beginnings or opportunities in love.
upright.career: Ambitious plans and new career opportunities.
upright.finance: Financial growth or new investment opportunities.

reversed.general: Laziness, lack of progress, missed opportunities.
reversed.love: Lack of initiative in relationships.
reversed.career: Missed career opportunities or lack of ambition.
reversed.finance: Financial delays or missed opportunities for growth.

name: Knight of Pentacles
description: The Knight of Pentacles represents hard work, dedication, and a methodical approach to achieving goals.

upright.general: Hard work, dedication, methodical approach, persistence.
upright.love: Stable and committed approach to relationships.
upright.career: Hard work and persistence paying off in career.

reversed.love: Lack of excitement or slow progress in relationships.
reversed.career: Procrastination or lack of drive in career.
reversed.finance: Financial stagnation or reluctance to take risks.

name: Queen of Pentacles
description: The Queen of Pentacles represents nurturing, practicality, and financial security.

upright.general: Nurturing, practicality, financial security, domestic success.
upright.career: Practical and nurturing approach leading to career success.
upright.finance: Financial stability through practicality and nurturing resources.

reversed.love: Neglecting emotional needs in relationships.
reversed.career: Overworking or neglecting personal life for career success.
reversed.finance: Financial imbalance due to overworking or neglecting other areas.

name: King of Pentacles
description: The King of Pentacles represents financial success, stability, and leadership.

upright.career: Success and leadership in career.
upright.finance: Achieving financial success and stability through discipline.

reversed.love: Focusing too much on material aspects in relationships.
reversed.career: Greed or misuse of power in career.
reversed.finance: Financial instability or greed affecting success.
